thread.section_title: PC Game Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PC Game Supply | www.pcgamesupply.com
thread.title: leejwesty
thread.title_full: PC Game Supply reviewed by leejwesty

author: leejwesty
title: leejwesty
text:
This was my first purchase with PCGameSupply. I brought a $10 PSN Voucher on the site, I live in the UK but have a UK & US account and wished to top up my US account. I found the price cheaper than anywhere else and decided to take the plunge. Easy checkout procedure and my voucher was issued via my PCGameSupply account straight away for me to use. You can pay via Card or PayPal so very safe. I did come across a issue with the mobile site not liking my PayPal details but the Desktop version worked flawlessly hence the 4*
Will definitely use again :)
